Kimberly Kingsley
Energy Coach, Author & Teacher
January 25, 2017, Renee was a client of Kimberly’s

I have known Kimberly for years and her passion and ability to move people personally and professionally is overwhelming. I have read her books and hired her as a motivational speaker for an employer. Kimberly has a very unique energetic, approachable and mindfully spiritual way of engaging people. I often think of her as one of the only people who can be the calm presence in a storm. Her ability to approach matters in a introspectively intellectual manner while the rest of us spin in chaos is remarkable. Personally I find her to be a pure, true soul that I consider honored to know. Professionally, I find her to exude poise, confidence and corporate coaching and mentoring knowledge that any organization should seek to integrate in to their coaching business model.
